author: eric
msg: Impact protocols-pop3 MailboxAdapter further to Decouple POP3 UID forming logic from protocol implementation (PROTOCOLS-98)

author: rwesten
msg: Also removed the stax-api from the commons bundle list. Now all XML APIs are loaded via the System Bundle
Minor: update commons-io to the current version 2.4

author: rwesten
msg: the stax-api is no longer included. This is because this API is part of the JDK 1.6+ and Stanbol does anyway require this version of the JDK
